channel.title: CVE Feed for libvirt -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for libvirt -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-1064|2024-09-17T01:51:12.642Z -- libvirt -- libvirt
item.description: libvirt version before 4.2.0-rc1 is vulnerable to a resource exhaustion as a result of an incomplete fix for CVE-2018-5748 that affects QEMU monitor but now also triggered via QEMU guest agent.
